section.name: Nanning Aspects
section.p: WARNING! The documentation has not been properly updated for the latest quite major refactoring. It does not at the moment properly document Nanning.
There is now a blog/wiki for Nanning located at http://nanning.snipsnap.org. It's based on SnipSnap.
We're occasinally hanging out at the Werken IRC server. Connect a suitable IRC-client to irc.werken.com channel #nanning.
Nanning Aspects is a simple yet scaleable aspect-oriented framework for Java.

Nanning is also nice "little" town in Guanxi province in southern China. It's about 1-2 million inhabitants which barely makes it a town by chinese standards. It is not to be confused with the much larger Nanking/Nanjing.
